reviews.text: Pizza was great and the atmosphere is very chill, great place for family meet ups, friends, or alone! Would highly recommend Pizza or Salads or Sandwiches, we‚Äôll really anything on the menu, check it out, go R-U-N! ü§£

Wes and Hunter are absolutely incredible! They're the most helpful people I've ever had the pleasure of meeting. When my vehicle broke down, they went above and beyond to get me back on the road. Their kindness is truly top-notch. I'm forever grateful for their help. 10000000/10 love themüëèüëèüëèüëè"

Prairie Grove Razorback pizza is always freshly made to order. They are so friendly and courteous. My husband has red meat and dairy allergy from tick bite Alpha Gal. They will allow me to bring dairy free cheese or bake without cheese. We sure appreciate that! My grandson loves the Razorback theme! I enjoy the fully loaded salad bar too!

So I moved and received a gift certificate for a large free pizza and cheese sticks so I thought I'd give them a try. And they were so nice and the food was delicious will be coming back. The guy who waited on me so friendly and gave us free drinks while we waited on our food. Super great and very clean!!!

The staff is always friendly and the pizza is always hot and fresh. They have some of the best cauliflower crust in the River Valley that even my picky teenagers love! It‚Äôs a family atmosphere even when they‚Äôre super busy. We go at least once a month and will definitely be back for more cheesy goodness ü§§

editorial_summary.overview: Chain pizzeria offering standard pies, plus wings, salads & a variety of hot sandwiches.

recentReviews.text: My 1st time in this place. The food and service was off the charts good. Had the pizza and the wings. Great job to the entire staff.

My daughter and I came on gameday to enjoy there tasty salads not to discourage their pizza as well bc great as well but was surprised by our waitress Jaden that they get to pick a table a day to comp their meal. We got comp‚Äôd but also just amazing service, hospitality, etc from Jaden. The free meal surprise was just the HUGE cherry on the top‚ÄºÔ∏è
I love this place<3!!! I got to use my free small pizza for my birthday today!
Thank you for the cheese pizza! It was so satisfying. Good cheese browned just right, tasty sauce and tender crust. I loved it. Perfectly balanced.

Wes and Hunter are absolutely incredible! They're the most helpful people I've ever had the pleasure of meeting. When my vehicle broke down, they went above and beyond to get me back on the road. Their kindness is truly top-notch. I'm forever grateful for their help. 10000000/10 love themüëèüëèüëèüëè"
In town for a show and lucked into this gem! Dynamite vegan pizza!

So I moved and received a gift certificate for a large free pizza and cheese sticks so I thought I'd give them a try. And they were so nice and the food was delicious will be coming back. The guy who waited on me so friendly and gave us free drinks while we waited on our food. Super great and very clean!!!
Possibly the best pizza we have had in a very long time.  The staff was awesome and the atmosphere is Razorback patriotic.  Most definitely will be a repeat customer.

detailedReviews.text: In town for a show and lucked into this gem! Dynamite vegan pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Lyndsay Rasmussen
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza ever!

detailedReviews.author: Megan Woods
detailedReviews.text: So I moved and received a gift certificate for a large free pizza and cheese sticks so I thought I'd give them a try. And they were so nice and the food was delicious will be coming back. The guy who waited on me so friendly and gave us free drinks while we waited on our food. Super great and very clean!!!

detailedReviews.author: Matt Taylor
detailedReviews.text: Possibly the best pizza we have had in a very long time.  The staff was awesome and the atmosphere is Razorback patriotic.  Most definitely will be a repeat customer.

detailedReviews.author: Becky Shaver
detailedReviews.text: Our favorite place!

detailedReviews.author: Job Thomas
detailedReviews.text:
The food was great time was not to long the service was
Friendly and curious time respectful. It's definitely going back return multiple times

detailedReviews.author: Stephen Forrest
detailedReviews.text: I like a simple cheese pizza from here.. It reminds me of NYC street pizza... Greasy, salty, and crispy, yet floppy crust. When it's on, it's on.  However, my only complaint is this: consistency, ya'll!  After a long day at work today, I wanted that greasy, crusty, crispy vibe, but today and sometimes other days, the pizza wasn't what I remembered from two weeks ago or a month before that, and probably, yes, the year before that. But today, ya'll, was an unfortunate misfire. I won't hold it too harshly against you all. I still ate it.

detailedReviews.author: Felicia arce
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in fort Smith hand's down

detailedReviews.author: Nick (Nickademous26)
detailedReviews.text: Love Jims Pizza! Always a great experience!

detailedReviews.author: Matthew Wilson
detailedReviews.text: Great service and very friendly environment, an amazing pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Emily N
detailedReviews.text: Crystal was our server. She was friendly, efficient, and helpful.

detailedReviews.author: Megan Yancy
detailedReviews.text: It was amazing üòç

detailedReviews.author: MIke Clark
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was hot and fresh. It was exactly how I ordered it and it was ready on time.

detailedReviews.author: Carol Ann
detailedReviews.text: Always reliable and delicious! I love that they have gluten and dairy free options !

detailedReviews.author: Anastasia Harford
detailedReviews.text: Received a gift certificate for moving into the neighborhood and we will definitely be back! Pizza and cheese sticks were amazing ü§©

detailedReviews.author: David Wright
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in Fort Smith. Piping hot when I stopped to pick it up. Dining in is a treat also.

detailedReviews.author: Michelle C
detailedReviews.text: Excellent vegan pizza and the owner and staff are all very kind and friendly.

detailedReviews.author: dani22479
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza and great service. Always!

detailedReviews.author: Cee Tee
detailedReviews.text: I just consumed The Best pizza üçï of my life at Jim‚Äôs Razorbacks Pizza !  Mmmmmmm extra bacon ü•ì!!

detailedReviews.author: Saylor McHam
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza, delicious gluten free options.

detailedReviews.author: Brian Scott
detailedReviews.text: The staff here is probably the friendliest in town.  Pizza is awesome and affordably priced.

detailedReviews.author: Terry Lamb
detailedReviews.text:
Well I'd post a picture but there's nothing left. Lol
Seriously best pizza within 100 miles.

detailedReviews.author: Lisa Holman
detailedReviews.text: Delicious üòã

detailedReviews.author: Zachary Carr
detailedReviews.text: Service is always great! Food is even better! A staple to Fort Smith - one of my favorite places for pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Christian Davidson (Chris)
detailedReviews.text: New favorite pizza place

detailedReviews.author: Steven H (Big Tiny or Tiny)
detailedReviews.text: I'm pretty picky when it comes to pizza and these guys have a really good sauce. Just enough spice to it. My staff was super nice. Food was super good. I will definitely go back again.

detailedReviews.author: David Sutter
detailedReviews.text:
Great pizza, sandwiches, beer and service.
I like having lunch here best.

detailedReviews.author: Saba Stewart
detailedReviews.text: Prairie Grove Razorback pizza is always freshly made to order. They are so friendly and courteous. My husband has red meat and dairy allergy from tick bite Alpha Gal. They will allow me to bring dairy free cheese or bake without cheese. We sure appreciate that! My grandson loves the Razorback theme! I enjoy the fully loaded salad bar too!

detailedReviews.author: Madison Lowe
detailedReviews.text: We always love the atmosphere and experience! The food is always hot and fresh!

detailedReviews.author: Don Solomon
detailedReviews.text: Our first trip to Jim‚Äôs and it will not be our last. The service was wonderful and the pizza was very tasty. If I had a suggestion; advertise your vegan options better.

detailedReviews.author: Terry Nichols
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in town, wonderful staff and great atmosphere.   I love it here.

detailedReviews.author: Derinda Wallace
detailedReviews.text: Service was great pizza was great

detailedReviews.author: Tracy House
detailedReviews.text: My wife and l ate there last night and it was amazing; my new pizza place. The pizza was great and the service was excellent. See you next Friday.

detailedReviews.author: Tyler Bridges
detailedReviews.text: Great Pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Sandy Porter
detailedReviews.text: Thanks, Wes, for including "Mediterranean Pizza" on your menu.  It fits the Mediterranean diet that we are on.  And yes, the diet is working.

detailedReviews.author: De Anna Schmalz
detailedReviews.text: We love the pizza at Jim‚Äôs Razorback pizza. We had 11 people in our party and they were very busy, but easily able to accommodate us. DS

detailedReviews.author: Gerald King
detailedReviews.text: Good food and excellent service.

detailedReviews.author: nick tucker
detailedReviews.text: It was a great experience from the taking the order on the phone to picking up the order and meeting Wes.

detailedReviews.author: Trishia McKenney
detailedReviews.text:
Jim's Razorback pizza is my favorite pizza in AR.
The employees are friendly, polite. Great you as you go in their place and tell you Thank-you and to have a great day.
Such a Friendly environment and GREAT Pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Mark Tolton
detailedReviews.text: Great food and delivery service was quick!

detailedReviews.author: John Kientz
detailedReviews.text:
Service was polite and helpful despite  being very busy.  Pizza was very good.
J K

detailedReviews.author: Kat Fesmire
detailedReviews.text: We LOVE this place! It was the first pizza place we ate after moving here and it's one of the best in town! üòÅ we're military so have eaten pizza all over the world... and this one is really good! We'll definitely be back!

detailedReviews.author: Midge Haggard-Burthe
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza and friendly staff. Will be back.

detailedReviews.author: Darlene Adams
detailedReviews.text:
Excellent food
Excellent service
And I love it when you give us a chance to save some money!!!

detailedReviews.author: Stephanie Grimm
detailedReviews.text: This is a Fort Smith Classic! Best pizza & salad‚Ä¶ especially the bacon cheeseburger! Everyone that works there is super nice, too!

detailedReviews.author: Chris Murphy
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza selection! Vegan pepperoni was on point! Doesn't matter your dietary preferences, they can meet it! I have been coming here for years and can without a doubt say they have the best pizza in Fort Smith!

detailedReviews.author: Brittany Wilson
detailedReviews.text: The staff is always friendly and the pizza is always hot and fresh. They have some of the best cauliflower crust in the River Valley that even my picky teenagers love! It‚Äôs a family atmosphere even when they‚Äôre super busy. We go at least once a month and will definitely be back for more cheesy goodness ü§§

detailedReviews.author: Amber Rogers
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was great and the atmosphere is very chill, great place for family meet ups, friends, or alone! Would highly recommend Pizza or Salads or Sandwiches, we‚Äôll really anything on the menu, check it out, go R-U-N! ü§£

detailedReviews.author: John Hindman
detailedReviews.text: My family loves this restaurant. The food and service are always great. We always look forward to eating here.

detailedReviews.author: Carmen Abbott
detailedReviews.text: We had a family reunion of sorts and went to dinner at Jim's Razorback Pizza. Our server was so great at keeping everyone happy. We had a total of 11 in our group. She even kept our tickets perfectly accurate. Some of us traveled well over 1300 miles to get to Ft. Smith so our time was brief together. We would recommend this establishment highly!!

detailedReviews.author: Cheryl Montag
detailedReviews.text: Greatest pizza in yown.

detailedReviews.author: Leeann Pendergrass
detailedReviews.text: They serve the best pizza in Fort Smith! I have never had a bad experience here.

detailedReviews.author: David D
detailedReviews.text: Everything is expensive these days, but to me, razorback pizza is still worth it.  You can feed a family of 4 for $30-40 and the food is very good.

detailedReviews.author: Chase Cameron
detailedReviews.text:
Said they were VERY BUSY and that the wait may be 1hr30min +
We received our pizza delivered in 40 mins and so hot that we had to let it cool off before serving. Jim‚Äôs is the real deal and always has been. We love them

detailedReviews.author: Julianna Johnson
detailedReviews.text: The pizza is the best in Fort Smith!

detailedReviews.author: Alex Morgan
detailedReviews.text: Did pick up service. Customizing pizza online needs a little bit of specifications added, such as what sauce you're getting. Do I have to pick a specific sauce for my pizza, or if I don't pick one listed, will I get something not on it or will I get none?

detailedReviews.author: Robert Boyd
detailedReviews.text: Razorback Pizza is a must-visit for anyone craving delicious, high-quality pizza in Arkansas. The crust is perfectly crispy, the toppings are always fresh, and the flavors are spot-on. The atmosphere is welcoming, and the staff is friendly and attentive, making the dining experience even better. Beyond pizza, their pasta dishes and salads are just as impressive, offering something for everyone. Whether you‚Äôre dining in with family or grabbing takeout,  Razorback Pizza never disappoints. Highly recommend!

detailedReviews.author: Caleb Owen
detailedReviews.text: Food is good, expect a long wait, was told 20 minutes, wound up waiting over 35 minutes. I was in a rush and would have cancelled the order no sweat had they just been honest from the get go.

detailedReviews.author: Alex Strand
detailedReviews.text:
Had a wonderful experience on Sunday. The staff was friendly and was quick with service. They went beyond what is expected for a sitdown restaurant and everything was clean.

The food was delicious and freshly cooked, not something that was frozen and reheated. I ordered a Supreme pizza that had plenty of toppings unlike most places that go light on the toppings. We also got cheesy breadsticks that came fresh out of the oven with ranch and their pizza sauce. The breadsticks were hot and soft with plenty of cheese on them. My daughter loved the breadsticks. On top of this they gsve my daughter a cup with a top and straw instead of a regular cup which is important for a young child since they are prone to tipping the cup to far when drinking out of a straw.

They boxed up our leftovers for us which was a nice change from us doing it ourselves as we get our daughter ready to leave.

Overall I highly recommend Jim's Razorback Pizza as the food and service is excellent. If you are looking for a place to head out on a Sunday Jim's should definitely be on your list.

detailedReviews.author: James Atchley
detailedReviews.text: This place is the best! It's my stop when traveling through Fort Smith!! Customer service is the best, call in while traveling they were able to tell me what I ordered previously and duplicate the order. This makes such a difference when you only come through on every few months! Pizza is great even cut into squares (much easier to eat while driving)!!!

detailedReviews.author: Jennifer Leigh
detailedReviews.text:
They're so good to us! They really take care of you here.

*still good! Went tonight

detailedReviews.author: Brianne Myers
detailedReviews.text: We have always had to best food and service here. We go a lot, don't judge. My girls love their cheese pizza and spaghetti. We always get the Hog Wild or their version of the supreme. I have modifications on both and they have always taken wonderful care to get it right. The one time it wasn't right, it was made right immediately. The cheese bread sticks are SO good! The restaurant is always clean, which is why we go so much because I have an immunocompromised daughter; I know it's clean enough for her. We don't go during peak hours so that we can be seated away from other customers as much as possible. Everyone is as nice as can be every time. They feel like family now.

detailedReviews.author: Janet Shappard
detailedReviews.text: Extremely nice staff. Accommodating and considerate .  Great rapore with all customers.

detailedReviews.author: Karen Rock
detailedReviews.text: The service at Jim‚Äôs Razorback Pizza was excellent. The people are nice and go out of their way to help you. I would recommend this place to everyone I know.

detailedReviews.author: Perry Jones
detailedReviews.text: Wonderful people and amazing pizza at Jim's!!! LOOOOOOVE this place and I take my family here all the time... Kids brought their friends and they had a great time!

detailedReviews.author: Cody
detailedReviews.text: Wonderful pizza nice staff

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.9/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers are thrilled with the surprise of complimentary meals, which adds a delightful and memorable touch to their dining experience. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
The pizza is consistently praised for its exceptional taste, with specific mentions of perfectly browned cheese, tasty sauce, and tender crust. - social media marketing can showcase this strength

The staff is frequently highlighted for their friendliness, efficiency, and going above and beyond to assist customers, creating a welcoming and supportive environment. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
improvementOpportunities: Inconsistent pizza quality - review management can address this concern
Lack of clarity in online ordering customization - social media marketing can improve this area
Long wait times beyond the promised duration - Boostly marketing services can improve this
